abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32559324, pmid32606316, pmid32609333, pmid32614399, pmid32614816, pmid32591839, pmid32614392, pmid32614385, pmid32614815, pmid32608325, pmid32600101, pmid32602562, pmid32600078, pmid32605666, pmid32609390, pmid32614889, pmid32592118, pmid32592396, pmid32600107, pmid32600175, pmid32614817, pmid32609081, pmid32602200, pmid32608999, pmid32600183, pmid32602596, pmid32608207, pmid32606285, pmid32609557, pmid32591466, pmid32576316, pmid32591346, pmid32578948, pmid32609621, pmid32585083, pmid32609307, pmid32614810, pmid32608474, pmid32609839, pmid32614377, pmid32600170, pmid32593209, pmid32614086, pmid32602262, pmid32609640, pmid32577723, pmid32591408, pmid32579256
